meanings.definition: Complaining or murmuring in a discontented manner.
meanings.sent1: The grumblier customer in the store made everyone feel uneasy.
meanings.sent2: She became grumblier as the wait time at the doctor's office increased.
meanings.sent3: The grumblier cat refused to eat the new brand of food.
meanings.sent4: The grumblier clouds seemed to be grumbling about the upcoming storm.
meanings.sent5: The grumblier expression on his face told us he was not happy.

meanings.definition: More inclined to grumble or complain than others.
meanings.sent1: He was grumblier than his siblings when it came to doing chores.
meanings.sent2: The grumblier students always found something to complain about in class.
meanings.sent3: The grumblier puppy barked at the slightest noise outside.
meanings.sent4: Her grumblier nature made it challenging to find joy in simple things.
meanings.sent5: The grumblier tone in her voice indicated her dissatisfaction.
